## ğŸŒŸ About Zeural

Zeural is a revolutionary, community-driven educational platform. We believe that the best teachers are often those who have recently walked the path themselves. Our platform is built **by learners who are now open-source contributors**, creating a living, breathing repository of knowledge that evolves with its community.

We host a vast and diverse range of contentâ€”from ancient **mythology** to cutting-edge **AI/ML**, as well as **blogs**, **research summaries**, and hands-on **programming** resources. Whether you're a beginner looking for clarity or an expert sharing your insights, Zeural is your home.

## ğŸš€ Vision

To democratize knowledge creation and become the most reliable, community-verified learning resource on the internet, spanning all disciplines.

## ğŸ› ï¸ Tech Stack

- **Frontend:** React.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS  
- **Backend:** Node.js, Express.js  
- **Database:** MongoDB / PostgreSQL  
- **Authentication:** Auth0 / JWT
